extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).

basic.description: Studies focused on Modern and Contemporary literature that do not fit within the established Group III rubrics (British, Canadian, American, Postcolonial, Indigenous). For detailed information, consult the Department.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Group III: Special Studies
